posts.title: Dub Through The Night
posts.content: As low as my eyes be I roll with the gangstas don't get foul with your mouth The wrong punchline'll have niggas inside of your house Nigga I'm doing good I made it out of the hood I own Beverly Hills no more bottles or wood.
posts.author: Green Lion Crew

posts.title: Higher Meds
posts.content: When Marcus Garvey a shown like storm Tеnor Saw buss when him ring the alarm Bob Marley shot thе sherrif so him cyaah simmer down Nuh make nuh politician take unuh fi clown.
posts.author: Yaadcore

posts.title: Born To Be A Star
posts.content: Does fame in this game have to change who you are? Or could I be the same one who came from a far-away life Just to make it in these Broadway lights?
posts.author: Stranjah Miller
